name: Record Rush
description:
Have you ever had a rough day? On those days, does some music on your walk home cheer you up? And does that music happen to attract large gelatinous cubes to your location?

Such is life for Abby. Help her escape this jealous slime as it tries to steal her mixtape. Channel the vibe of the music as you run infinitely! Play fast songs to move faster as the slime nears, or more laid back beats when you want to enjoy the view. Jump from platform to platform before the slime consumes them - taking you with!
